task.summary:
refactor: Consolidate NodeInfo structure and enhance P2P message hierarchy
- Replace `DhtNodeInfo` and `RelayNodeInfo` with unified `NodeInfo` record - Add new `NodeInfo.cs` file to centralize node metadata handling - Refactor DHT, Relay, and Peer messages to use `NodeInfo` for consistency - Add union attributes for polymorphic P2P message serialization (MessagePack) - Upgrade MessagePack package to v3.1.3 for improved performance and features - Introduce `NSec.Cryptography` for updated Ed25519 signing and verification - Simplify TTL property type in DHT messages (`long` to `int`) - Enhance peer presence with detailed status via new `PeerPresence` structure - Remove deprecated `GroupMessage` type and associated usage
Remove `PocketSizedUniverse.P2P` implementation. Clean up related types and messages.

MESSAGE.value:

Remove `PocketSizedUniverse.P2P` implementation. Clean up related types and messages.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
